snippet: The New York Times Company’s results were aided by a gain on the sale of the company’s stake in Indeed.com, a jobs search engine, and the sale of the About Group, the online resource company.
abstract: New York Times Company reports fourth-quarter net income of $176.9 million, or $1.14 a share, up dramatically from $58.9 million, or 39 cents a share, in the same period a year earlier; cites gains from asset sales; total revenue for quarter rose 5.2 percent, to $575.8 million.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times Company’s results were aided by a gain on the sale of the company’s stake in Indeed.com, a jobs search engine, and the sale of the About Group, the online resource company.

headline.seo: Asset Sales Help Quarterly Profit at Times Company
headline.main: Asset Sales Help Lift Profit at New York Times Company, but Ad Revenue Declines
headline.print_headline: Asset Sales Help Lift Profit at New York Times Company, but Ad Revenue Declines
